name: INFECTED: Classic Survival Horror
blurb: Survival Horror- Utilizing randomly generated maps & traditional survival horror design to deliver scares with modern controls.

rewards.reward: Lone Survivor:\r\nOur thanks and appreciation for your continuing support!

Young Survivor:\r\nIn game credit thanks as one of our backers.  A set of wallpapers for your desktop and mobile devices. A voucher to unlock the Day One 2x4 melee weapon ingame. Also includes the previous reward tier!
Tried Survivor:\r\nFirst Access Demo, and every iteration of the demo up to our initial release. Also includes the previous reward tier!
Dubbed survivor:\r\nA digital artbook and soundtrack. A voucher to unlock the Day One Baseball Bat weapon ingame. Also includes the previous reward tier!
Common Survivor:\r\nDay One digital copy which grants free content updates. Also includes the previous reward tier!

Headliner Survivor:\r\nDesign your own ingame newspaper/ magazine headline/ document for everyone to see (We reserve the rights to modify or change it to fit within the story).  A voucher to unlock the Day One Handgun weapon. Also includes the previous reward tier!

Redeemed Survivor:\r\nUpgrade to Redeemed Survivor Edition ( Includes: Exclusive Redeemed Survivor two sided sleeve, manual, Day One game disc, physical soundtrack, 3 postcards designed from our environments). A voucher to unlock the Day One Assault Rifle weapon. Also includes the previous reward tier!

Proven Survivor:\r\nUpgrade to Proven Survivor Edition (Includes: Exclusive Proven Survivor two sided sleeve, manual, Day One game disc, softcover mini art book, 3 postcards designed from our environments, first run T-shirt, 2x 8.5x11 Lithographic Poster, physical soundtrack, and limited Proven Survivor Packaging). A voucher to unlock the Day One Shotgun weapon. Also includes the previous reward tier!

Prepared Survivor:\r\nUpgrade to Survival Edition: ( Includes:\r\nExclusive Survival Edition sleeve, manual, Day One game disc, Complete hardcover art book, first run T-shirt, 8.5x11 Lithographic poster, physical soundtrack, journal of an unknown survivor). A voucher to unlock the Day One sub machine gun weapon. Also includes the previous tier!

Vain Survivor:\r\nDesign a poster for an ad of your choice to be in the game ( this can be in the side of a building, bus stop, bus, missing persons poster, be creative!). Also includes a print signed by our artist. (We reserve the rights to modify or change it to fit within the story). A voucher to unlock the Day One Katana weapon. Also includes the previous tier!

Undead Survivor:\r\nHave yourself in the game as a zombie designed by you with your very own voice! (We reserve the rights to modify or change it to fit within the story). A voucher to unlock the Day One Chainsaw weapon. Also includes the previous reward tier!

Skilled Survivor:\r\nHave yourself in the game as a NPC designed by you with your very own voice! Design your own quest as well!  (We reserve the rights to modify or change it to fit within the story). A voucher to unlock the Day One Rocket Launcher weapon. Also includes the previous reward tier!

Forged Survivor:\r\nDesign your own fully playable character with your voice! Also design an ability for your character to specialize in! (We reserve the rights to modify or change it to fit within the story and balance it accordingly)  A voucher for for 3 additional digital copies. A voucher to unlock the Day One Crossbow weapon. Also includes the previous reward tier!

Engineered Survivor:\r\nDesigner: Help design an environment of your choice, work closely with our level designers to create a unique map you can call your own to show off your creative vision. You can also Design your own weapon as well to be unlockable in the game and Day One camo for you to distribute. (We reserve the rights to modify or change it to fit within the story). Also includes the previous reward tier!

Master Survivor:\r\nPartner: Be part of our creative visions, keep updated first hand on the development and art of all our projects. Game with us as well! We will work with you and take your insight into our creation art. You will have a legacy status in all our games with acknowledgement and Exclusive packaging signed by our whole team. Also includes the previous reward tier!
